ygData.subject: Re: Tinkering skill cap, fixed?
ygData.msgSnippet: I petitioned a gm and he said that no changes were made to tinkering in the last patch.  Guess we have to wait a little longer... QdP ...   ... =====
ygData.messageBody:
I petitioned a gm and he said that no changes were made to tinkering in
the last patch. Guess we have to wait a little longer...

QdP

--- tomservo8899 <tomservo8899@...> wrote:
> I just read that the patch that was supposed to be this morning was
> actually
> already done. They did it when the servers were down with that Cerfnet
> and
> UUnet trouble. Anyway, I was wondering if anyone has tried the
> tinkering
> skill since the patch to see if the skill cap (I think it was (Level -
> 15) x
> 5) has been fixed yet. I had been hoping that they would fix it in this
> patch after someone reported that a GM said they should be fixing it
> soon,
> maybe even in the next patch. If anyone knows if you can Tinker outside
> the
> level cap now please say so =)
>
> Logalog,
> Veeshan Server
>
>
>
>
<HR>
<html>
